description:
Being suspected by other team mates that there is one more of him, Takahashi is thrown out from the baseball team. While seeking advice from Kigata, Takahashi complains a harsh stomachache. He is brought to a hospital and receives a diagnosis of having a foreign body in his stomach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pages in White (The World of Spirits) The Self and The Self Part 2
